channel.title: Pk point what am i doing wrong? 317
channel.description:
trying to add pk points i get this message when i try to compile what have i done wrong?
client.java:11779: error: cannot find symbol pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(toke n2); ^ symbol: variable pkPoints location: class client 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Pk point what am i doing wrong? 317
item.dc:creator: @arcuza arcuza
item.description:
@arcuza wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:9, topic:429795”][quote author=arcuza link=topic=532475.msg3891938#msg3891938 date=1326938081]
there was an old pkingpoints system which wasn’t work so i’m trying to add pkpoints do i have to get rid of pkingpoints fo\irst?
[/quote]
Sure go ahead and delete that and then add THIS.

In every error you posted it was variable pkPoints, add it all up and you’ll realize I fixed it… I think :)[/quote]
i got it working thanks guys

Read full topic
